articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: India central bank likely selling dollars to prevent rupee from falling to record low, traders say - Reuters India
articles.description: India's central bank is likely selling U.S. dollars at around 83.22-83.25 rupee levels to prevent the rupee from heading towards a record low, seven traders said on Thursday.
articles.content: MUMBAI, Sept 28 (Reuters) - India's central bank is likely selling U.S. dollars at around 83.22-83.25 rupee levels to prevent the rupee from heading towards a record low, seven traders said on Thursd… [+371 chars]
